Geothermal Energy Association.Description: The Geothermal Energy Association represents the interests of geothermal power plant developers, operators, and suppliers.
The Geothermal Energy Association promotes the use of geothermal energy as a renewable energy source.
The Geothermal Energy Association advocates for the adoption and utilization of geothermal heat pumps for heating and cooling purposes.
The Geothermal Energy Association supports the sustainable development and utilization of geothermal resources.
